channel.title: Arios - The #1 HD 2009/OSRS Server
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://puu.sh/jajCe/b38a01f93c.png[/img] [B]Useful links:[/B] [URL=http://"http://www.ariosrsps.com"]Homepage[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.ariosrsps.com/forums"]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.ariosrsps.com/register"]Register[/URL]
[CENTER]What is Arios?[/CENTER]
Arios has been a developing server for four years. We excelled at being named the greatest remake server RSPS has ever witnessed.
After concurring the remake world we decided to take on a new characteristic to define our uniqueness.
A new era of Arios is before you, the time has come that we leap ahead to the HD world. We are offering you a new experience of Arios in HD brought to you with a mixture of unique OSRS updates.
Together we can create a new legacy for Arios as the [URL=http://www.google.com/forums/usertag.php?do=list&action=hash&hash=1]#1[/URL] leading HD 2009/OSRS server, the only thing we need from you, is YOU!
[IMG]http://puu.sh/jbgrO/3cc0b4c346.png[/img] [spoiler=game]
[ul][*]Minigames: Barrows, Bounty Hunter, Clan Wars, God Wars, Mage Arena, Mage Training Arena, Pest Control, Puro Puro, Tzhaar Fight Caves, Duel Arena, Tzhaar Fight Pits, Warriors Guild [*]Bosses: Giant Mole, King Black Dragon, Dagannoth Kings, Bork, God War Bosses, Chaos Elemental, Kalphite Queen,TzTok-Jad, [B]Kraken[/B],[B] Corporal Beast[/B] [*]Over 30 quests & more developed weekly [*]All skilling with perfection emulation including [B]construction[/B] [*]All F2P area content! [*]Achievement diaries [*]Grand exchange [*]Clue Scrolls [*]Lootshare [*]Random events [*]Game & Combat sounds [*]Boss Pets [*]OSRS Items![/ul]
Checkout our previous project threads to find ALL the content Arios has! [/spoiler]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/jbgsd/081c6ae4b6.png[/img] [spoiler=website]Arios easily is the most integrated server out there. We have one account called an Arios account which contains all your information which allows access to our game servers & our website/forums.
Website features:
[ul][*]Account management [*]Custom forums [*]Highscores [*]Voting [*]Monthly Vote Rewards [*]Player Advertisments [*]Account Registration [*]Account Recovery [*]Grand Exchange Database [*]NPC Database [*]Item Database[/ul]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/jbwVy/17bc021eb8.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/jbgr8/e11d34d39c.png[/img] [spoiler=media] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2UjJ3mB.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Qq9hYa9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ECXOyK9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oWwgXZh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tPk1cnc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2UsLayQ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/S9GYm6Q.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/iKY2v/7288031643.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/jb8WS/20c795b69b.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/jb85W/dcb0f0a906.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/jba73/b7715ff0c5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EHGgEj3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/faIRdwa.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LYBchlu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/m5EV2ng.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Qj7vLOl.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/iNuPK/da24250dae.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/iNvCq/a6f1e8247b.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/w4Smlrf.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/ikJ6P/7daacb6a64.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BndmtXp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wjcD5Rf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jiZsCRi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1u8E2EG.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rvGcN9I.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/iQXOd/e8d8bc5cc8.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/iQXRa/61eeeaa463.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/iQXRK/803ebc0741.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/iZuuN/7d1338727d.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/iWyXy/4e779ee573.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/iWyWB/26b1c33226.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/iWyPh/c6bdaab45b.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/iWyOt/0cf3fb6c09.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/iWzpp/4bdaced13a.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/jbgru/7bded6903d.png[/img] [spoiler=FAQ] Question: What revision is Arios? Answer: 530
Question: What is the EXP rate? Answer: 10x
Question: Will we lose our character progress from 498 -> 530? Answer: No, Everything will stay the same.
Question: Where can I register an account? Answer: Either at [url=http://www.ariosrsps.com/register]Arios - The [URL=http://www.google.com/forums/usertag.php?do=list&action=hash&hash=1]#1[/URL] Emulated 2008 RSPS[/url] or through the "Create Account" option in the client.
Question: How will OSRS content be implemented? Answer: We will poll which content our players want from OSRS & go with what the players want.
Question: Is Arios still a remake? Answer: inherently Arios's content is a remake, however Arios is gearing away from the remake lifestyle in the sense of having to walk places, slow exp rates, etc. We want to make Arios what the players WANT Arios to be. [/spoiler] [IMG]http://puu.sh/jbhf2/005e78f3c8.gif[/img] [/CENTER]

item.title: Arios - The #1 HD 2009/OSRS Server
item.dc:creator: @prothieum prothieum
item.description:
@prothieum wrote:

Arios will be relaunching in approximately 17 days. We hope to see our old friends back in action upon relaunch.

You will start off from where you last progressed, donators will have early access to help test new content.

You can stay updated with the progression of Arios by visiting our website at Home - Arios The #1 2009 HD/OSRS Private Server

I’m glad to be writing this post. Show your appreciation by spreading the word & representing us with our banner:

005e78f3c8.gif728×90

Kind regards,

Vexia

Read full topic

item.title: Arios - The #1 HD 2009/OSRS Server
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

[quote=“xplode, post:3, topic:552626”][quote author=Welliton_inc link=topic=671541.msg4490963#msg4490963 date=1437914820]
Why the hell would you make OSRS “HD”. It just ruins the whole purpose of OSRS. It is suppose to be “old school”. If you really like modern crap, go make a pre-eoc server.
[/quote]

Items Such as Toxic Blowpipe Armadyl Crossbow aren’t what you consider “oldschool” the only reason why its called Oldschool is because of the graphics, not the items in the game lol. so before you try to call it modern crap. get your information straight. because everyone knows those items arent considered “oldschool”.[/quote]

Or you get your information straight. This server cannot be considered “OSRS” if the graphics are in what you like to to call “HD” or to me is just plain anti-RuneScape graphics. Again, if you love modern graphics, make a pre EoC server.

Read full topic

item.title: Arios - The #1 HD 2009/OSRS Server
item.dc:creator: @xplode xplode
item.description:
@xplode wrote:

The server is being taken over.

Arios: Vexia and Seppe are recoding the Arios server and will re-re-re-release within a month or two( I highly recommend you not to join Arios when it comes back up, as for adam Rodriguez is a slimy thief and only wants your money…)

Kratos: the 3 other developers such as Hope,Splinter,Emperor and a new dev named David, they are taking the arios source and making their own server. its exactly like arios but with more content such as Way more OSRS content, and Full construction with a dope Website. these 4 developers dont just want money they want to succeed for once because they couldnt with vexia because he would threaten to ban players if they didnt donate. or would push out rare items into game secretively if kids had abit more money…

If you are still interested in joining Kratos, its in Beta Mode and want to test things out Send me Private Messages and ill send you the client. Enjoy your Day.

Welliton_inc:

Why the hell would you make OSRS “HD”. It just ruins the whole purpose of OSRS. It is suppose to be “old school”. If you really like modern crap, go make a pre-eoc server.

Items Such as Toxic Blowpipe Armadyl Crossbow aren’t what you consider “oldschool” the only reason why its called Oldschool is because of the graphics, not the items in the game lol. so before you try to call it modern crap. get your information straight. because everyone knows those items arent considered “oldschool”.

Read full topic

item.title: Arios - The #1 HD 2009/OSRS Server
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

[quote=“kittea, post:4, topic:552626”]Welliton, please don’t make a stupid comment like that. Making it the #530 revision with graphics was better for the server and have been holding a much better player base and friendly community. Everyone always says “make it more unique to bring players in”. Well Arios staff did that by making OSRS HD and you’re still bitching about it.

Please if you would like to comment, go and log on to Arios. You won’t regret it man

Kind Regards,
Kittea, long time player of Arios[/quote]

The reason they made it a higher revision was in order to bring in a younger audience who never experienced RuneScape Pre 474. Younger players are more suited the the “HD” graphics. Also what you’re saying is utter junk, the revision of the server has no influence on the friendliness of a server…

Read full topic

item.title: Arios - The #1 HD 2009/OSRS Server
item.dc:creator: @prothieum prothieum
item.description:
@prothieum wrote:

[CENTER]

Useful links:
Homepage
Forums
Register

[CENTER]What is Arios?[/CENTER]

Arios has been a developing server for four years. We excelled at being named the greatest remake server RSPS has ever witnessed.

After concurring the remake world we decided to take on a new characteristic to define our uniqueness.

A new era of Arios is before you, the time has come that we leap ahead to the HD world. We are offering you a new experience of Arios in HD brought to you with a mixture of unique OSRS updates.

Together we can create a new legacy for Arios as the #1 leading HD 2009/OSRS server, the only thing we need from you, is YOU!


[spoiler=game]

[ul][]Minigames: Barrows, Bounty Hunter, Clan Wars, God Wars, Mage Arena, Mage Training Arena, Pest Control, Puro Puro, Tzhaar Fight Caves, Duel Arena, Tzhaar Fight Pits, Warriors Guild
[]Bosses: Giant Mole, King Black Dragon, Dagannoth Kings, Bork, God War Bosses,
Chaos Elemental, Kalphite Queen,TzTok-Jad, Kraken, Corporal Beast
[]Over 30 quests & more developed weekly
[]All skilling with perfection emulation including construction
[]All F2P area content!
[]Achievement diaries
[]Grand exchange
[]Clue Scrolls
[]Lootshare
[]Random events
[]Game & Combat sounds
[]Boss Pets
[*]OSRS Items![/ul]

Checkout our previous project threads to find ALL the content Arios has!
[/spoiler]


[spoiler=website]Arios easily is the most integrated server out there. We have one account called an Arios account which contains all your information which allows access to our game servers & our website/forums.

Website features:

[ul][]Account management
[]Custom forums
[]Highscores
[]Voting
[]Monthly Vote Rewards
[]Player Advertisments
[]Account Registration
[]Account Recovery
[]Grand Exchange Database
[]NPC Database
[*]Item Database[/ul]

17bc021eb8.png1249×828

[/spoiler]


[spoiler=media]


ECXOyK9.png516×502

oWwgXZh.png516×501

tPk1cnc.png515×501





















e8d8bc5cc8.png760×496









[/spoiler]


[spoiler=FAQ]
Question: What revision is Arios?
Answer: 530

Question: What is the EXP rate?
Answer: 10x

Question: Will we lose our character progress from 498 -> 530?
Answer: No, Everything will stay the same.

Question: Where can I register an account?
Answer: Either at Arios - The #1 Emulated 2008 RSPS or through the “Create Account” option in the client.

Question: How will OSRS content be implemented?
Answer: We will poll which content our players want from OSRS & go with what the players want.

Question: Is Arios still a remake?
Answer: inherently Arios’s content is a remake, however Arios is gearing away from the remake lifestyle in the sense of having to walk places, slow exp rates, etc. We want to make Arios what the players WANT Arios to be.
[/spoiler]

005e78f3c8.gif728×90

[/CENTER]

Read full topic
